INSPECTION & SUPERVISION

Construction Supervision is to manage, direct and monitor all construction activities to align with safety, schedule and quality based on contract agreement.

To generate the projects, PTRE will provide a solid engineering team from several disciplines (Process, Instrument, Electrical, Mechanical, Piping and Civil Engineering) and utilize the latest technology in 3-D.
